description:
Ver is a researcher from the American Holy Relic Research Facility`s 2nd Division Mobile Disaster Response Corps who is analyzing Sakurai Ryouko`s theories. His area of specialty is biology, and he is currently using those talents to uncover the true identity of the holy relics. He admires Hibiki, Tsubasa, and Chris, who saved the world, and overlaps his own dreams with theirs.
Source: ANN
name: Ver Hakase
